query.always: edl_session.query(edl_models.Mission, edl_models.Entry, edl_models.ParachuteDescent, edl_models.ParachuteDeployConditions, edl_models.BackshellSeparation, edl_models.HeatShield, edl_models.ParachuteDescentSensing, edl_models.PoweredDescent, edl_models.Touchdown).join(edl_models.Entry).join(edl_models.ParachuteDescent).join(edl_models.ParachuteDeployConditions).join(edl_models.BackshellSeparation).join(edl_models.HeatShield).join(edl_models.ParachuteDescentSensing).join(edl_models.PoweredDescent).join(edl_models.Touchdown).filter(edl_models.Mission.name.ilike('%${mission}%'))

result_fields.parameter_unit: row.${parameter}_unit if hasattr(row, '${parameter}_unit'.split('.')[0]) and hasattr(getattr(row, '${parameter}_unit'.split('.')[0]), '${parameter}_unit'.split('.')[1]) else ''
